title: My Dear, It’s You - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Mature   Romance   School Life   Seinen
tags: Age Progression   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Cold Protagonist   Coming of Age   Complex Family Relationships   Couple Growth   Doting Love Interests   First Love   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Kind Love Interests   Living Abroad   Living Alone   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Models   Modern Day   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Popular Love Interests   Quiet Characters   Second Chance   Unconditional Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Rainbow Bees   이드한
description:
Kim Tae-Pyeong lost his parents in a tragic fire. Living his days in darkness and nightmares, he meets Rosie, a girl who seemed to brighten his life. She was his spring and sun to the void winter of his life. Only with her could Tae-Pyeong feel at ease.

But... they separated...

Seven years later, when they've grown mature, they find each other again.

Was seven years enough to know that they could not live without each other?>
